definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The student found it difficult to learn the subjunctive mood of English.
sentences.chinese: 這個學生髮現英語的虛擬語氣很難學。

sentences.english: As to the use of subjunctive mood, I'll deal with it in detail later.
sentences.chinese: 至於虛擬語氣的用法，我以後再詳細地講。

sentences.english: In his lecture the teacher expanded on the uses of the English subjunctive mood.
sentences.chinese: 老師在講課中詳細地講述了英語虛擬語氣的用法。

sentences.english: If there were no subjective mood, English would be much easier.
sentences.chinese: 要是沒有虛擬語氣，英語就會容易得多了。

sentences.english: If there were no subjunctive mood, English would be easier.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有虛擬語氣，英語會容易些。

sentences.english: If there were no subjunctive mood, English would be much easier.
sentences.chinese: 要是沒有虛擬語氣，英語就會容易得多了。

sentences.english: C. Had I had time, I would have run around that lake again.
sentences.chinese: 虛擬語氣，如果我有時間，我會再繞着湖跑。

sentences.english: In a multiple-use the subjunctive sentence.
sentences.chinese: 在多用虛擬語氣的句子。

sentences.english: Here is a website about introduction to subjunctive mood.
sentences.chinese: 虛擬語氣用法比較複雜，下邊這個網址有詳細介紹。

sentences.english: In this sentence the verb is in the subjunctive mood.
sentences.chinese: 在這個句子裏，動詞用的是虛擬語氣。
